source.sqlReaderQuery:
select  [WC_OrderID] as WooCommerceOrderNumber,
		[SytelineOrderStatus],
		[SytelineTrackingNumber] as TrackingNumber,
		[SytelineShipCode] AS ShipCode,
		[SytelineCarrierName] as CarrierName,
		[SytelineActualShipDate] as ShipDate
		from [dbo].[Order] where SyncupRequired=1

properties.description: Play Power WooCom Self Hosted-Integration Runtime
